comment: the recorded rate is that for a greenhouse gas installation, which is the difference between the minimum rate set by the legislation - Û30.48/tCO2 - and the average of daily forward EUA prices between Sept 1 and Oct 31; that is, for EU ETS installations the tax acts as a carbon price floor and they face a reduced rate
